info: ピッカピカ and ビカビカ are more emphatic

gloss.text: bursting with youth and energy (esp. young woman)
(fish) jumping around energetically (e.g. when caught in a net)
with a shrill sound (of a whistle)
taking a cut (of someone else's money)
skimming (a percentage of the profits, proceeds, etc.)
quickly, in a bouncing way (e.g. for a bow)
from the best to the worst
state of fine weather where one is subject to direct sunlight
dealt hand consisting of one 20-point card and six 1-point cards
whistling, chirping, piping, etc. sound made by birds, insects, pipes, children, etc.
slap (sound of a flat object continuously striking something)
moving in small leaps as a frog or rabbit
staying healthy until old age, then dying painlessly
used at sentence end to affect cuteness

kana.text: ピクリともうごかない
ぴくりともうごかない

gloss.text: with one's veins about to burst (from pent-up anger)
piyo (placeholder name for a variable, similar to foobar)
